instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.message:
Hi guys.

I have this 820-3437 green light no power. 

3v & 5V present created from U7501
PPBUS_G3H - 8.6v
SMC_ONOFF_L Triggers

I found that i'm missing P5VS0_EN which comes from S0 Enables and i don't have voltage even from R1462 and the resistor is fine 100K but it shows when measured on board 36.4k.

PP3V3_S5 i get3.3v on U8180. I tried to solder together pins 4 and 5 on U8180 to get the voltage but still no power.

On U1930 pin 6 i have 3.3v but also normally ALL_SYS_PWRGD is missing. 

Any ideas?

Do you get 3V3_SUS?
Any pulse at L7520?
3V3_SUS it's 0v and L7520 i don't have a o-scope but when trigger SMC bypass  no changes
Check PM_DSW_PWRGD, PCH_DSWVRMEN, PM_BATLOW_L and SMC_ADAPTER_EN.

PM_DSW_PWRGD - 0v
PCH_DSWVRMEN - 2.4v
PM_BATLOW_L - 0v
SMC_ADAPTER_EN - 0v

I remeasured and re-soldering the SMC and i don't have 5 and 3v on coils but i get green and then orange light no power

I got back the 3 and 5v there was a broken line near U7501.

Now i have:
PM_DSW_PWRGD - 1.05v
PCH_DSWVRMEN  -  2.4v
PM_BATLOW_L   - 3.4v
SMC_ADAPTER_EN  - 3.4v

"PM_DSW_PWRGD - 1.05v"
Not good, need to fix it.
Check first S5_PWRGD.

PM_BATLOW_L level?
Be sure to use original Magsafe 2 charger.
PM_BATLOW_L  it's 3.34v. I use original charger

Post again all above mentioned signals.
Also check the 4 PCH's RTC signals.

3V3_SUS must appear before pressing power button.

PM_DSW_PWRGD - 3.4v at first but after some time drops to 1.05v
PCH_DSWVRMEN  - 2.7v
PM_BATLOW_L  - 3.3v
SMC_ADAPTER_EN  - 3.4v then sometimes drops to 1v

The only place that shows heat on the thermal camera is U7100 but the temperature is below 30

PCH_INTRUDER_L - 3v
PCH_INTVRMEN - 3.2v
PCH_SRTCRST_L - 0v 
RTC_RESET_L - 3.3v

I bridged PCH_SRTCRST_L and RTC_RESET_L and got 3v and a fan spin and power on. I really don't know why PCH_SRTCRST_L  was stuck
I did change it before i assemble it :) Thanks for the help
